name: Coffee Quest (ChromedDragon)
description:
This game was made of the Extra credits game jam, the one were the theme was 'Awesome per second', and I gotta say guys this game really embodies that.

if you guys enjoyed this game jam project, be sure to check out my real game I'm working on Quest? Quest!: https://chromeddragon.itch.io/questquest-free-demo

Music provided by Serius Beat

Additional sounds by ZapSplat

Salvation [Inspiring Uplifting Orchestra] by Ghostrifter Official https://soundcloud.com/ghostrifter-of... Creative Commons — Attribution 3.0 Unported — CC BY 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/b... Music promoted by Audio Library https://youtu.be/b487O0qTpXo
